name: Hermea
description:
Race against the clock to deliver the gods' mail on time! Hermea is a third person speedrunner where you play as Hermea, an intern at Hermes' Delivery Service, who transports mail to Greek gods by traversing perilous environments on foot and using a variety of interchangeable abilities. The gods will throw everything they can at you to try and stop you, but with some encouraging words from Hermes, you can totally take them on!

Features:
  • 6 action packed levels and 1 tutorial level
  • 6 unlockable abilities such as Artemis' Bow Grappling Hook and Zeus' Favor Teleport
  • 3 different environments inspired by Greek Mythology
  • Online leaderboards
  • Twitch integration to allow chat to vote on silly modifiers
  • Multiple "Curses" or difficulty modifiers for added gameplay and to test yourself
  • A number of accessibility options so every gamer can play
  • Controller Support
